author: David Evans
comment: Love the reto look and the response to getting an update to suite my Sony SW3 was second to none.. Great job.
title: Excellent and the update is perfect

author: John Miller
comment: Good watch face, just need to ability to configure the face on my phone and controller the brightness levels.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hi John, can you please drop us a note at support@seenapps.com? I would like to look at your brightness problem.

comment: Partial to a bit of retro, this watch face is the business! Looks great.
title: Favourite

author: Jeffrey Blattman
comment: No face is worth screen burn in

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: You can change that in the settings. Please drop us an email at support@seenapps.com for help

title: No low bit ambient mode

author: Bri Robertson
comment: This takes me back to the early 80's....good job 👍
title: Love it !!!

author: Mike Searle
comment: Great app works well, no issues, given some feedback which has led to further improvement, very quick response which is great, thanks!
title: Great for my lg urbane

author: Adam Smith
comment: Nice to see a developer care about feedback, I asked for more colors, literally one day later got more colors, best face ever!

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Please upgrade to 1.3 (7 new colors) and tell me if that works for you!

title: Love it, thanks for the update!

author: Oliver Clark
comment: Fantastic watchface, fantastic developer responsiveness! Now awesome with the addition of the "Month & Year" option for the face. I need no other watchface!

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Please upgrade to v1.3 and tell me if it's better. It has 7 more colors and the mode you asked for (3 new modes total).

author: Jason Hutchins
comment: It's a nice upgrade from the free version, but it wasn't selectable from the watch. I had to select it from my phone to get it to show up on the watch .. not sure why. Still really happy with this watch face.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Thank you for the kind feedback! Regarding installation, this is not something the face controls itself. It only operates once it is running on the device. We are getting several reports on this type of issue across different faces but eventually it works. We reported this to Google Support and hope they will improve installation experience.

title: Neat retro watch face

comment: Great looking watch face, I like the 2 switchable sections, wouldn't mind seeing a 'month' option for selection. Fantastic overall.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! This feature has been added to version 1.2 which has just been pushed to the store. Please give it few hours to make it to your watch.

title: Great upgrade from free version.
